verses.name: 1 Samuel 24:1
verses.text: And it came to pass, when Saul was returned from following the Philistines, that it was told him, saying, Behold, David is in the wilderness of En–gedi.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 24:2
verses.text: Then Saul took three thousand chosen men out of all Israel, and went to seek David and his men upon the rocks of the wild goats.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 24:3
verses.text: And he came to the sheepcotes by the way, where was a cave; and Saul went in to cover his feet: and David and his men remained in the sides of the cave.
